hero.title: Experience Luxury in Miami
hero.subtitle: Discover our exclusive services and indulge in the ultimate getaway

about.title: About Us
about.description: Miami Get Away specializes in turning every stay in Miami into an experience of unparalleled luxury, quality and comfort. Offering a variety of services, from car rentals of all kinds and properties for any type of need, to yachts of different categories, Miami Get Away adapts to the needs and expectations of each client, providing a completely personalized attention.
about.mission: Whether you are looking for an absolute relaxing vacation or a vibrant city experience, Miami Get Away takes care of every detail, ensuring comfort, style and excellence in every aspect of your visit. With headquarters in Miami and a team of U.S.-trained professionals, we are the perfect partner for those who want much more than just a visit; we offer an authentic quality experience every step of the way during your stay in Miami.

services.title: Our Services

descriptions.cars: Experience the thrill of driving the world's finest automobiles.
descriptions.yachts: Set sail on crystal-clear waters with our premium yacht rentals.
descriptions.apartments: Stay in style with our carefully selected luxury apartments.
descriptions.villas: Indulge in the ultimate privacy and comfort of our exclusive villas.

aboutFounder.title: Facundo's Life
aboutFounder.imageAlt: Facundo, founder of Miami Get Away
aboutFounder.paragraph1: With a clear vision and a solid background in international business, Facundo has positioned his concierge company in Miami as one of the most outstanding in offering unique and exclusive experiences to his clients.
aboutFounder.paragraph2: On nine years, he has made the United States his home, and his journey through different states has allowed him to capture the best of each place to give his company a singular approach.
aboutFounder.paragraph3: Graduated in International Business and with an MBA specialized in marketing, he combined his academic knowledge with his passion for service and hospitality. As a real estate agent, he also brings an additional level of professionalism and access to exclusive properties, making each stay in Miami unforgettable and unprecedented.
aboutFounder.paragraph4: His company Miami Get Away specializes in renting vehicles, properties, yachts of various categories, among other services, adapting to the needs of each client and offering completely personalized attention. Whether for those looking for a vacation of absolute rest or a vibrant experience in the city.
aboutFounder.paragraph5: Facundo and his team take care of every detail, guaranteeing comfort, style and excellence. Thanks to a combination of experience, empathy and dedication, Facundo has become a reference for those who wish to discover Miami from a truly exclusive and sophisticated perspective.
aboutFounder.paragraph6: His personalized approach and deep knowledge of the market make him the perfect ally for those seeking much more than a simple visit: an authentic quality experience in every aspect of their stay in Miami.
